literallayout.computeroutput:
1 #Arquivos contendo os menus do programa. Cada menu recebe um strscr e um dicionario de estados, e os gerencia conforme a necessidade. 2 3 import curses 4 import aux_lib 5 import easygui 6 7 from db import DB 8 from collections import defaultdict 9 import os 10 11 12 from aux_lib import write_stdscr, write_stdscr_a 13 import curses.textpad 14 15 class Container(object): 16 '''Classe representando um objeto que pode ser um Nodo ou uma Tabela ou uma Lista de celulas ou uma Celula. data representa o objeto a gerar o container 17 ''' 18 19 def __init__(self,data): 20 #Guarda tipo do objeto 21 self.raw_type = type(data) 22 self.name = "" 23 self.data = 0 24 self.type = "" 25 26 27 28 #Inicializa nome e dados dependo do tipo 29 if self.raw_type == aux_lib.Nodo: 30 #Se é um nodo de uma trie 31 self.name = "(" + aux_lib.get_label(data) + ")->" 32 self.data = data 33 self.type = "Node" 34 35 36 elif self.raw_type == aux_lib.Table: 37 #Se é uma tabela 38 self.data = data 39 self.name = data.table_label 40 self.type = "Table" 41 42 43 elif self.raw_type == list: 44 #Se é uma lista de celulas 45 self.data = data 46 parent_list = [] 47 for item in data: 48 if (item.cell_type != "Blank") and (item.cell_type != "Merge"): 49 parent_list.append(item.parent_node) 50 51 #Se todos os nodos tem o mesmo pai, aponta para chave 52 if len(set(parent_list)) == 1: 53 parent = data[0].parent_node 54 self.name = aux_lib.get_name(parent) + "->[]" 55 else: 56 parent = data[0].key_col 57 self.name = aux_lib.get_name_labelless(parent) + "->[]" 58 59 60 61 self.type = "Cell_List" 62 63 elif self.raw_type == aux_lib.Cell: 64 #Se é uma celula 65 self.data = data 66 self.name = aux_lib.get_name_labelless(data) 67 self.type = "Cell" 68 69 elif self.raw_type == type(defaultdict()) or self.raw_type == type(dict()) or self.raw_type == type(defaultdict(dict)): 70 #Se é um dicionario 71 self.data = data 72 data_string = "" 73 74 key = list(data.keys())[0] 75 value = list(data.items())[0] 76 77 data_string = data_string + '{0} : {1} and others'.format(str(key),str(type(value))) 78 79 self.name = "".join(list(data_string)[0:108]) 80 self.type = "Data_Dict" 81 else: 82 self.type = "Empty" 83 84 85 def start_menu(state_dict): 86 '''Função que representa o menu inicial e seus estados''' 87 #Strings de menus e seus locais na tela em tuplas 88 str_menu_inicial = "Select option:
1:Generate database from tables
2:Load database from object file
0:Exit" 89 90 91 92 print(str_menu_inicial) 93 c = input() 94 os.system('cls') 95 f_exit = False 96 97 98 if c == '1': 99 #Trie de tabelas 100 state_dict['loc'] = easygui.diropenbox("Select directory") 101 state_dict['table_trie'] = aux_lib.generate_table_trie(state_dict['loc']) 102 state_dict['db'] = DB(state_dict['table_trie']) 103 104 elif c == '2': 105 state_dict['loc'] = easygui.fileopenbox("Select object file",filetypes = "*.obj") 106 state_dict['table_trie'] = aux_lib.load_trie(state_dict['loc']) 107 state_dict['db'] = DB(state_dict['table_trie']) 108 109 else: 110 state_dict['f_exit'] = True 111 112 #Muda estado para menu principal 113 state_dict['state'] = 'main_menu' 114 115 #Cria estado de containers 116 state_dict['containers'] = dict() 117 118 t = state_dict['db'].tables.strings_dict[state_dict['db'].tables.strings_list[0]] 119 state_dict['containers']['a'] = Container(t) 120 state_dict['containers']['b'] = Container(t.table_data[8][0].child_nodes) 121 state_dict['containers']['c'] = Container(t.table_data[8][3]) 122 state_dict['containers']['k'] = Container(t.table_data[1][0].child_nodes) 123 state_dict['containers']['d'] = Container(state_dict['db'].tables.strings_dict) 124 125 state_dict['containers']['n'] = Container(aux_lib.walk_to(state_dict['db'].tables.root,'brasil: dispendio nacional em ciencia e tecnologia (c&t) por atividade')) 126 127 128 def main_menu(stdscr, state_dict): 129 '''Função que representa o menu principal e seus estados''' 130 131 132 curses.cbreak() 133 curses.noecho() 134 135 #Strings e locais 136 137 str_menu_principal = "[a-z]:Draw container
1:Access Table
2:Access Db
3:Run Query
4:Help
9:Save Current DB
-:clear table area
0:Exit" 138 loc_menu_principal = (0,0) 139 140 str_saving = "Saving db...
" 141 loc_saving = (4,40) 142 143 str_done = "Done
" 144 loc_done = (4,80) 145 146 147 #Controle de loop 148 local_exit = False 149 150 #loop de repl local 151 while(local_exit == False): 152 #limpa 153 clear_menu_area(stdscr) 154 restore_cursor(stdscr) 155 156 #escreve menu na tela 157 write_stdscr(stdscr,str_menu_principal,loc_menu_principal) 158 159 stdscr.move((state_dict['loc_data_entry'])[0],(state_dict['loc_data_entry'])[1]) 160 161 draw_state(stdscr,state_dict) 162 #Entrada do usuario 163 c = stdscr.getch() 164 165 #Trata letras de a até z 166 if (c > 96) and (c < 123): 167 #Se é letra, desenha container 168 if(chr(c) in state_dict['containers'].keys()): 169 draw_container(stdscr,state_dict['containers'][chr(c)]) 170 elif chr(c) == '-': 171 clear_table_area(stdscr) 172 173 elif chr(c) == '1': 174 access_table(stdscr, state_dict) 175 elif chr(c) == '2': 176 access_db(stdscr, state_dict) 177 elif chr(c) == '3': 178 run_query_menu(stdscr,state_dict) 179 elif chr(c) == '0': 180 state_dict['f_exit'] = True 181 local_exit = True 182 elif chr(c) == '9': 183 loc = easygui.filesavebox('Select location for obj file') 184 185 #Salva trie 186 187 write_stdscr(stdscr,str_saving,loc_saving) 188 write_stdscr(stdscr," 
 ",loc_done) 189 aux_lib.save_trie(state_dict['table_trie'],loc) 190 write_stdscr(stdscr,str_done,loc_done) 191 192 elif chr(c) == '4': 193 clear_table_area(stdscr) 194 #Lista de queries -> DB: 195 #<trie> options : tables,key_rows,key_cols,super_key 196 #pre;<trie>!<string> -> Prefix search on DB.trie 197 #suf;<trie>!<string> -> Suffix search on DB.trie 198 #reg;<trie>!<string> -> RegExp search on DB.trie 199 #get_all;<trie> ->Get all tables in a db.trie 200 #insert;<trie> -> Inserts input container into the trie(table only). Returns inserted table 201 #get;<trie>!<string> -> Returns table where table_label == string 202 #yield;<trie> -> Regen trie cache and returns Trie root 203 #walkto;<trie>!<string> -> Walk to string in current trie and returns node 204 #moonwalkto;<trie>!<string> -> Walk to root in current trie and returns node 205 #delete;trie!<string> -> Walk to node in trie and deletes data. Returns deleted node 206 207 str_DB_info = "<trie> options : tables,key_rows,key_cols,super_key 
" + "pre;<trie>!<string> -> Prefix search on DB.trie 
" + "suf;<trie>!<string> -> Suffix search on DB.trie 
" +"reg;<trie>!<string> -> RegExp search on DB.trie 
" + "get_all;<trie> ->Get all tables in a db.trie 
" 208 str_DB_info = str_DB_info + "insert;<trie> -> Inserts input container into the trie(table only). Returns inserted table 
" + "get;<trie>!<string> -> Returns table where table_label == string
" + 'yield;<trie> -> Regen trie cache and returns Trie root 
' + 'walkto;<trie>!<string> -> Walk to string in current trie and returns node 
' + 'moonwalkto;<trie>!<string> -> Walk to root in current trie and returns node 
' + 'delete;trie!<string> -> Walk to node in trie and deletes data. Returns deleted node 
' 209 210 #Lista de queries -> Table: 211 #key_col;<null | col_name> -> Retorna todas colunas chave da tabela se nulo, ou todos os dados da coluna especificada 212 #key_row;<null |a,b > -> Retorna todas as chaves da tabela se nulo, ou todas as chaves de indice entre a e b 213 #get_cell;<y,x> -> Retorna celula na posicao y,x 214 #insert_cell;<y,x> ->Inserts output cell into table and returns the inserted cell 215 #delete_cell;<y,x> -> Deletes cell at X,y and returns the deleted cell 216 #get_cells;<uy,ux,ly,lx> -> Gets a list containing the cells starting at <uy,ux> and ending at <ly,lx> 217 218 str_t_query_1 = 'key_col;<null | col_name> ->Returns every key_col if null or(|) every cell in a key_col if not null
' 219 str_t_query_2 = 'key_row;<null |a,b > -> Returns every Key if null | Every key from index a to b
' 220 str_t_query_3 = "insert_cell;<y,x> ->Inserts output cell into table and returns the inserted cell
" 221 str_t_query_4 = "delete_cell;<y,x> -> Deletes cell at X,y and returns the deleted cell
" 222 str_t_query_5 = 'get_cells;<uy,ux,ly,lx> ->Gets a list containing the cells starting at <uy,ux> and ending at <ly,lx>
' 223 str_t_query_final = 'get_cell;<y,x> -> Returns Cell at y,x 
' 224 225 str_Table_info = str_t_query_1 + str_t_query_2 + str_t_query_3 + str_t_query_4 +str_t_query_5+ str_t_query_final 226 227 228 229 #lista de queries -> Cell: 230 #edit<data> -> change a cell data 231 232 str_Cell_info = 'edit<data> -> change a cell data 
' 233 234 #lista de queries -> List: 235 #unpack;<null> -> creates a single list with every child in the list 236 #first;<null> -> pop the first item in the list 237 #rest;<null> -> returns listw/o first item 238 #select;<index> -> copy item from index 239 #remove;<index> -> remove selected item 240 241 str_List_info = "unpack;<null> -> creates a single list with every child in the list
first;<null> -> pop the first item in the list
rest;<null> -> returns list without first item
select;<index> -> copy item from index
remove;<index> -> remove selected item
" 242 243 #lista de queries: -> Dict: 244 #pop;<null> remove a random item from dict 245 246 str_Dict_info = 'pop;<null> remove a random item from dict' 247 248 #lista de queries -> Node: 249 #get_all;<null> get all data below a node 250 251 str_Node_info = "get_all;<null> get all data below a node
" 252 253 254 write_stdscr(stdscr,"DB commands:",(12,4)) 255 write_stdscr(stdscr,str_DB_info,(14,6)) 256 257 write_stdscr(stdscr,"Table commands:",(26,4)) 258 write_stdscr(stdscr,str_Table_info,(27,5)) 259 260 write_stdscr(stdscr,"List commands:",(34,4)) 261 write_stdscr(stdscr,str_List_info,(35,5)) 262 263 write_stdscr(stdscr,"Cell commands:",(41,4)) 264 write_stdscr(stdscr,str_Cell_info,(42,5)) 265 266 write_stdscr(stdscr,"Dict commands:",(44,4)) 267 write_stdscr(stdscr,str_Dict_info,(45,5)) 268 269 write_stdscr(stdscr,"Node commands:",(47,4)) 270 write_stdscr(stdscr,str_Node_info,(48,5)) 271 272 273 274 def access_table(stdscr,state_dict): 275 '''Menu representando as opções de accesso a tabela''' 276 277 curses.cbreak() 278 curses.noecho() 279 280 str_access_menu = "[a-z]: Container containing a table object
1:Query Table

0:back" 281 loc_access_menu = (0 ,0) 282 set_container = "" 283 284 285 str_last_container = "Output Container: ["+set_container+"]" 286 loc_last_container = (7,0) 287 str_selected_table = "Selected table: []" 288 loc_selected_table = (8,0) 289 set_table = "" 290 291 str_table_menu = '' 292 local_exit = False 293 294 while(local_exit == False): 295 296 clear_menu_area(stdscr) 297 write_stdscr(stdscr,str_access_menu,loc_access_menu) 298 write_stdscr(stdscr,str_selected_table,loc_selected_table) 299 write_stdscr(stdscr,str_last_container,loc_last_container) 300 301 c = stdscr.getch() 302 303 #Trata letras de a até z 304 if (c > 96) and (c < 123): 305 if(chr(c) in state_dict['containers'].keys()): 306 if state_dict['containers'][chr(c)].type == "Table" : 307 current_table = state_dict['containers'][chr(c)].data 308 str_selected_table = "Selected table: ["+ current_table.table_label +"]" 309 write_stdscr(stdscr,str_selected_table,loc_selected_table) 310 set_table = chr(c) 311 draw_container(stdscr,state_dict['containers'][chr(c)]) 312 313 314 elif chr(c) == '0': 315 local_exit = True 316 elif chr(c) == '2': 317 write_stdscr(stdscr,"Press any key to save as container key",(4,60)) 318 c = stdscr.getch() 319 set_container = chr(c) 320 str_last_container = "Output Container: ["+set_container+"]" 321 elif chr(c) == '1': 322 323 #Inicializa tratamento de querry 324 curses.nocbreak() 325 curses.echo() 326 327 stdscr.keypad(True) 328 #restore_cursor(stdscr,state_dict) 329 clear_input_area(stdscr) 330 331 write_stdscr(stdscr,"Enter Query. "Blank") and (cell.cell_type != "Merge"): 939 y_pos = y_pos + 4 940 941 y_pos = 13 942 943 for cell in y_list: 944 if type(cell) == aux_lib.Cell: 945 draw_cell(stdscr,y_pos,41,Container(cell)) 946 if (cell.cell_type != "Blank") and (cell.cell_type != "Merge"): 947 y_pos = y_pos + 4 948 949 y_pos = 13 950 for cell in u_list: 951 if type(cell) == aux_lib.Cell: 952 draw_cell(stdscr,y_pos,79,Container(cell)) 953 if (cell.cell_type != "Blank") and (cell.cell_type != "Merge"): 954 y_pos = y_pos + 4 955 956 if container.type == "Data_Dict": 957 clear_table_area(stdscr) 958 y_pos = 13 959 x_pos = 2 960 961 for key, value in container.data.items(): 962 str_output = "".join(list(str(key))[:90]) + ":" + str(value) 963 #trunka 964 str_output = "".join(list(str_output)[:114]) 965 966 #Trata fim da tabela 967 if(y_pos > 48): 968 break 969 970 971 972 write_stdscr(stdscr,str_output,(y_pos,x_pos)) 973 y_pos = y_pos + 1 974 975 def query_table(query, container_i, container_o): 976 '''Parses a string into a query and query a table''' 977 978 #Queries são formatadas da seguinte maneira: 979 # Separador de queries -> # 980 # Separador de <tipo, query> -> ; 981 # Dado contido no container "n"(somente no campo de dado da query) -> ! 982 983 #Separa queries 984 query_list = query.split("#") 985 986 #Executa as queries sequencialmente 987 for item in query_list: 988 (query_key,query_data) = item.split(';') 989 container_o = __query_table(query_key,query_data,container_i,container_o) 990 991 return container_o 992 993 def __query_table(query_key,query_data,container,container_o): 994 '''Função auxiliar para executar uma query sobre o container recebido. Salva o resultado da query no proprio container.''' 995 996 cell_container = [] 997 #Lista de queries: 998 #key_col;<null | col_name> -> Retorna todas colunas chave da tabela se nulo, ou todos os dados da coluna especificada 999 #key_row;<null |a,b > -> Retorna todas as chaves da tabela se nulo, ou todas as chaves de indice entre a e b 1000 #get_cell;<y,x> -> Retorna celula na posicao y,x 1001 #insert_cell;<y,x> ->Inserts output cell into table and returns the inserted cell 1002 #delete_cell;<y,x> -> Deletes cell at X,y and returns the deleted cell 1003 #get_cells;<uy,ux,ly,lx> -> Gets a list containing the cells starting at <uy,ux> and ending at <ly,lx> 1004 1005 if query_key == 'key_col': 1006 if not bool(query_data): 1007 return Container(container.data.key_cols) 1008 else: 1009 1010 for item in container.data.key_cols: 1011 if item.data == query_data: 1012 for n_item in item.child_nodes: 1013 cell_container.append(n_item) 1014 #Remove duplicados 1015 cell_container = list(set(cell_container)) 1016 1017 return Container(cell_container) 1018 #key_row;<null |a,b > -> Retorna todas as chaves da tabela se nulo, ou todas as chaves de indice entre a e b 1019 elif query_key =='key_row': 1020 if not bool(query_data): 1021 return Container(container.data.key_row.child_nodes) 1022 else: 1023 (a,b) = query_data.split(',') 1024 for key,item in enumerate(container.data.key_row.child_nodes): 1025 if key >= int(a) and key < int(b): 1026 cell_container.append(item) 1027 return Container(cell_container) 1028 1029 #get_cell;<y,x> -> Retorna celula na posicao y,x 1030 elif query_key == 'get_cell': 1031 (y,x) = query_data.split(',') 1032 return Container(container.data.table_data[int(y)][int(x)]) 1033 1034 elif query_key == 'get_cells': 1035 (uy,ux,ly,lx) = query_data.split(',') 1036 offset_y = int(ly)-int(uy) + 1 1037 offset_x = int(lx)-int(ux) + 1 1038 1039 for y in range(offset_y): 1040 for x in range (offset_x): 1041 cell_container.append(container.data.table_data[int(uy)+y][int(ux)+x]) 1042 return Container(cell_container) 1043 1044 elif query_key == 'insert_cell': 1045 (y,x) = query_data.split(',') 1046 container.data.table_data[int(y)][int(x)] = container_o.data 1047 return Container(container.data.table_data[int(y)][int(x)]) 1048 1049 elif query_key == 'delete_cell': 1050 (y,x) = query_data.split(',') 1051 #Marca como deletedo 1052 ret = Container(container.data.table_data[int(y)][int(x)]) 1053 container.data.table_data[int(y)][int(x)].cell_type = "Blank" 1054 container.data.table_data[int(y)][int(x)].data = "" 1055 1056 return ret 1057 1058 def query_dict(query, container_i, container_o): 1059 '''Parses a string into a query and query a table''' 1060 1061 #Queries são formatadas da seguinte maneira: 1062 # Separador de queries -> # 1063 # Separador de <tipo, query> -> ; 1064 # Dado contido no container "n"(somente no campo de dado da query) -> ! 1065 1066 #Separa queries 1067 query_list = query.split("#") 1068 1069 #Executa as queries sequencialmente 1070 for item in query_list: 1071 (query_key,query_data) = item.split(';') 1072 container_o = __query_dict(query_key,query_data,container_i,container_o) 1073 1074 return container_o 1075 1076 def __query_dict(query_key,query_data,container,container_o): 1077 '''Função auxiliar para executar uma query sobre o container recebido. Salva o resultado da query no proprio container.''' 1078 cell_container = [] 1079 1080 #lista de queries: 1081 #pop;<null> remove a random item from dict 1082 1083 if query_key == 'pop': 1084 return Container(container.data.popitem()[1]) 1085 1086 def query_node(query, container_i, container_o): 1087 '''Parses a string into a query and query a node''' 1088 1089 #Queries são formatadas da seguinte maneira: 1090 # Separador de queries -> # 1091 # Separador de <tipo, query> -> ; 1092 # Dado contido no container "n"(somente no campo de dado da query) -> ! 1093 1094 #Separa queries 1095 query_list = query.split("#") 1096 1097 #Executa as queries sequencialmente 1098 for item in query_list: 1099 (query_key,query_data) = item.split(';') 1100 container_o = __query_node(query_key,query_data,container_i,container_o) 1101 1102 return container_o 1103 1104 def __query_node(query_key,query_data,container,container_o): 1105 '''Função auxiliar para executar uma query sobre o container recebido. Salva o resultado da query no proprio container.''' 1106 cell_container = [] 1107 1108 #lista de queries: 1109 #get_all;<null> get all data below a node 1110 1111 1112 if query_key == 'get_all': 1113 ret = aux_lib.get_all_data(container.data) 1114 return Container(ret) 1115 1116 def query_list(query, container_i, container_o): 1117 '''Parses a string into a query and query a list''' 1118 1119 #Queries são formatadas da seguinte maneira: 1120 # Separador de queries -> # 1121 # Separador de <tipo, query> -> ; 1122 # Dado contido no container "n"(somente no campo de dado da query) -> ! 1123 1124 #Separa queries 1125 query_list = query.split("#") 1126 1127 #Executa as queries sequencialmente 1128 for item in query_list: 1129 (query_key,query_data) = item.split(';') 1130 container_o = __query_list(query_key,query_data,container_i,container_o) 1131 1132 return container_o 1133 1134 def __query_list(query_key,query_data,container,container_o): 1135 '''Função auxiliar para executar uma query sobre o container recebido. Salva o resultado da query no proprio container.''' 1136 cell_container = [] 1137 1138 #lista de queries: 1139 #unpack;<null> -> creates a single list with every child in the list 1140 #first;<null> -> pop the first item in the list 1141 #rest;<null> -> returns listw/o first item 1142 #select;<index> -> copy item from index 1143 #remove;<index> -> remove selected item 1144 1145 1146 if query_key == 'unpack': 1147 for item in container.data: 1148 for child in item.child_nodes: 1149 cell_container.append(child) 1150 1151 if query_key == 'first': 1152 return Container(container.data.pop(0)) 1153 1154 if query_key == 'rest': 1155 return Container(container.data[1:]) 1156 1157 if query_key == 'select': 1158 return Container(container.data[int(query_data)]) 1159 1160 if query_key == 'remove': 1161 return Container(container.data.pop(int(query_data))) 1162 1163 def query_cell(query, container_i, container_o): 1164 '''Parses a string into a query and query a cell''' 1165 1166 #Queries são formatadas da seguinte maneira: 1167 # Separador de queries -> # 1168 # Separador de <tipo, query> -> ; 1169 # Dado contido no container "n"(somente no campo de dado da query) -> ! 1170 1171 #Separa queries 1172 query_list = query.split("#") 1173 1174 #Executa as queries sequencialmente 1175 for item in query_list: 1176 (query_key,query_data) = item.split(';') 1177 container_o = __query_cell(query_key,query_data,container_i,container_o) 1178 1179 return container_o 1180 1181 def __query_cell(query_key,query_data,container,container_o): 1182 '''Função auxiliar para executar uma query sobre o container recebido. Salva o resultado da query no proprio container.''' 1183 cell_container = [] 1184 1185 #lista de queries: 1186 #edit<data> -> change a cell data 1187 1188 1189 if query_key == 'edit': 1190 container.data.data = query_data 1191 ret = container.data 1192 return Container(ret) 1193 1194 def query_run(query, container_i,container_o,db): 1195 '''Runs a query depending on input object type''' 1196 1197 #db queries are started by @ 1198 if '@' in query[0]: 1199 container_o = query_db(query[1:],container_i,container_o,db) 1200 else: 1201 if (container_i.type == "Table"): 1202 container_o = query_table(query,container_i,container_o) 1203 elif (container_i.type == "Data_Dict"): 1204 container_o = query_dict(query,container_i,container_o) 1205 elif (container_i.type == "Node"): 1206 container_o = query_node(query,container_i,container_o) 1207 elif (container_i.type == "Cell_List"): 1208 container_o = query_list(query,container_i,container_o) 1209 elif (container_i.type == "Cell"): 1210 container_o = query_cell(query,container_i,container_o) 1211 1212 1213 1214 1215 1216 1217 1218 return container_o 1219 1220 def query_db(query, container_i, container_o, db): 1221 '''Parses a string into a query and query a table''' 1222 query_list = query.split("#") 1223 1224 #Executa as queries sequencialmente 1225 for item in query_list: 1226 (query_key,query_data) = item.split(';') 1227 container_o = __query_db(query_key,query_data,container_i,container_o, db) 1228 return container_o 1229 1230 def __query_db(query_key,query_data,container,container_o, db): 1231 1232 #Lista de queries: 1233 #<trie> options : tables,key_rows,key_cols,super_key 1234 #pre;<trie>!<string> -> Prefix search on DB.trie 1235 #suf;<trie>!<string> -> Suffix search on DB.trie 1236 #reg;<trie>!<string> -> RegExp search on DB.trie 1237 #get_all;<trie> ->Get all tables in a db.trie 1238 #insert;<trie> -> Inserts input container into the trie(table only). Returns inserted table 1239 #get;<trie>!<string> -> Returns table where table_label == string 1240 #yield;<trie> -> Regen trie cache and returns Trie root 1241 #walkto;<trie>!<string> -> Walk to string in current trie and returns node 1242 #moonwalkto;<trie>!<string> -> Walk to root in current trie and returns node 1243 #delete;trie!<string> -> Walk to node in trie and deletes data. Returns deleted node 1244 1245 '''Aux to query_db''' 1246 cell_container = [] 1247 1248 if '!' not in query_data: 1249 q_trie = query_data 1250 else: 1251 (q_trie, query_data) = query_data.split('!') 1252 1253 #Tries dict 1254 tries = {'tables':db.tables,'key_rows':db.key_rows,'key_cols':db.key_cols,'super_key':db.super_key} 1255 1256 if query_key == 'pre': 1257 #Trie selecionada 1258 ret = aux_lib.prefix_search(tries[q_trie],query_data) 1259 return Container(ret) 1260 1261 if query_key == 'get': 1262 #Trie selecionada 1263 ret = tries[q_trie].strings_dict[query_data] 1264 return Container(ret) 1265 1266 if query_key == 'yield': 1267 tries[q_trie].yield_strings(tries[q_trie].root) 1268 ret = tries[q_trie].root 1269 1270 return Container(ret) 1271 1272 if query_key == 'walkto': 1273 #tries[q_trie].yield_strings(tries[q_trie].root) 1274 ret = aux_lib.walk_to(tries[q_trie].root,query_data) 1275 return Container(ret) 1276 1277 if query_key == 'delete': 1278 #tries[q_trie].yield_strings(tries[q_trie].root) 1279 ret = Container(aux_lib.walk_to(tries[q_trie].root,query_data)) 1280 del_n = aux_lib.walk_to(tries[q_trie].root,query_data) 1281 del_n.data = "" 1282 return ret 1283 1284 if query_key == 'moonwalkto': 1285 #tries[q_trie].yield_strings(tries[q_trie].root) 1286 ret = aux_lib.moonwalk_to(tries[q_trie].root,query_data) 1287 return Container(ret) 1288 1289 if query_key == 'reg': 1290 #Trie selecionada 1291 ret = aux_lib.regex_search(tries[q_trie],query_data) 1292 return Container(ret) 1293 1294 elif query_key == 'suf': 1295 #Trie selecionada 1296 ret = aux_lib.suffix_search(tries[q_trie],query_data) 1297 return Container(ret) 1298 1299 elif query_key == 'get_all': 1300 ret = aux_lib.get_all_data(tries[q_trie].root) 1301 return Container(ret) 1302 1303 elif query_key == 'insert': 1304 aux_lib.insert(container.data.table_label,container.data,tries[q_trie].root) 1305 return container 1306 1307 1308 1309 1310 1311 1312 1313
